summary: Build a modern, professional, mobile-responsive gym marketing website (WordPress theme style look) for 'Gym Workout Place' as a demo/portfolio client pitch site, with specified pages, sections, and lead-gen CTAs.
architectural_notes: Site should emulate a modern WordPress gym theme style (look/UX), but built as a standard web app/site.
Use high-quality placeholder/generic fitness imagery until user provides final assets.
WhatsApp and Google Maps should be implemented as simple external links if full API/embed is not available.
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Homepage hero gym interior with dramatic lighting, dark tones and red accents (home-hero.dim_2400x1350.png)
- Gym interior wide shot, modern equipment, dark energetic mood (about-hero.dim_2000x1200.png)
- Workout/program image: strength training scene (program-strength.dim_1600x1000.png)
- Workout/program image: weight training scene (program-weight.dim_1600x1000.png)
- Workout/program image: cardio training scene (program-cardio.dim_1600x1000.png)
- Workout/program image: CrossFit training scene (program-crossfit.dim_1600x1000.png)
- Workout/program image: functional training scene (program-functional.dim_1600x1000.png)
- Workout/program image: fat loss program scene (program-fatloss.dim_1600x1000.png)
- Workout/program image: muscle gain program scene (program-musclegain.dim_1600x1000.png)
- Workout/program image: HIIT workout scene (program-hiit.dim_1600x1000.png)
- Workout/program image: personal training session scene (program-personaltraining.dim_1600x1000.png)
- Trainer portrait photo 1, professional fitness coach, studio-like lighting (trainer-1.dim_1200x1200.png)
- Trainer portrait photo 2, professional fitness coach, studio-like lighting (trainer-2.dim_1200x1200.png)
- Trainer portrait photo 3, professional fitness coach, studio-like lighting (trainer-3.dim_1200x1200.png)
- Transformation highlight before/after style collage with fitness aesthetic (transformation-1.dim_1600x900.png)
- Transformation highlight before/after style collage with fitness aesthetic (transformation-2.dim_1600x900.png)
- Gallery image: gym interior (gallery-interior-1.dim_1600x1000.png)
- Gallery image: gym interior (gallery-interior-2.dim_1600x1000.png)
- Gallery image: workout session (gallery-workout-1.dim_1600x1000.png)
- Gallery image: workout session (gallery-workout-2.dim_1600x1000.png)
- Gallery image: equipment close-up (gallery-equipment-1.dim_1600x1000.png)
- Gallery image: equipment close-up (gallery-equipment-2.dim_1600x1000.png)
- Gallery image: client workout moment (gallery-client-1.dim_1600x1000.png)
- Gallery image: client workout moment (gallery-client-2.dim_1600x1000.png)

existing_features.title: Create a coherent, modern “WordPress gym theme” visual design system for the site and apply it consistently (dark energetic palette: black/red/dark grey; bold headings; strong CTA buttons; clean spacing; professional fitness vibe).

Implement site-wide layout components: sticky header navigation with links to Home, About, Workouts/Programs, Trainers, Membership/Plans, Gallery, Contact; footer with social media icons/links; smooth scrolling for in-page anchor navigation where applicable.

Build the Home page for “Gym Workout Place” with: hero image, headline “Transform Your Body. Transform Your Life.”, sub-text, and CTA buttons (Join Now, Free Trial, Contact Us); plus sections: Why Choose Us (Certified Trainers, Modern Equipment, Affordable Plans), Popular Workouts (with images), Member Transformation Highlights, and Testimonials.
Create the About Us page with a professional gym interior hero image, the provided mission text, and a values section listing: Discipline, Consistency, Results.

Create the Workouts / Programs page containing sections for each program: Strength Training, Weight Training, Cardio Training, CrossFit Training, Functional Training, Fat Loss Program, Muscle Gain Program, HIIT Workout, Personal Training. Each program must display a high-quality image and a short 2–3 line description.
Create the Trainers page showing professional trainer images and trainer cards including: “Certified Fitness Coach”, “Experience in weight loss & muscle building”, and “Personal training support”.

Create the Membership / Plans page with clean pricing cards for: Monthly Plan, Quarterly Plan, Half-Yearly Plan, Yearly Plan. Each plan must list features: Full gym access, All workout programs, Trainer guidance, Flexible timings, and include clear CTAs.
Create the Gallery page with categorized sections for gym interior images, workout sessions, equipment photos, and client workout moments.

Create the Contact Us page with: contact form, WhatsApp button, Call Now button, Google Map location link, and business info (address, phone number, opening hours). Use external links for WhatsApp and Google Maps (no embedded map/API requirement).

Ensure the site is SEO-friendly: semantic heading hierarchy (H1/H2/H3), sensible page titles/meta defaults per route, and accessible components (labels for form fields, keyboard navigable menus, focus states).
Add generated image assets to the frontend as static files and wire them into the UI (store under frontend/public/assets/generated and reference them from pages/cards).

new_feature_requests.summary: Create Home page with hero (headline/subtext), CTAs (Join Now/Free Trial/Contact Us), and sections: Why Choose Us, Popular Workouts, Member Transformations, Testimonials
Create About Us page with gym interior hero image, mission text, and values (Discipline, Consistency, Results)
Create Workouts/Programs page with sections for listed programs, each with image and 2–3 line description
Create Trainers page with trainer cards/images and key details (certified coach, experience, PT support)
Create Membership/Plans page with pricing cards (Monthly/Quarterly/Half-Yearly/Yearly) and included features
Create Gallery page with categorized gym/workout/equipment/client images
Create Contact Us page with contact form, WhatsApp button, Call Now button, Google Map location, and business info
Implement site-wide UI features: sticky header navigation, smooth scrolling, footer with social icons
Apply dark, energetic fitness theme (black/red/dark grey), bold headings, strong CTAs, clean layout, mobile responsive
Ensure SEO-friendly structure (semantic headings, meta/title defaults, clean URLs)

Implement backend support for contact form submissions: store submitted messages (name, email/phone, message, timestamp) in the single Motoko actor and expose query/update methods for creating and (optionally) listing submissions for demo/admin debugging.
